isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Opening Scuff Plate and Seat Belt Retractor Cover on Daycab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 72 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four torx head screws (Item 1) securing cab door opening scuff plate (Item 2) to cab floor, passenger side shown. Lay torx head screws out of the way and save for installation.

Remove push-in fastener (Item 3) securing seat belt retractor cover (Item 4) to seat belt retractor assembly (Item 5), passenger side shown. Lay push-in fastener and cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover out of the way and save for installation.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover.

figure.caption: Figure 72. Cab Door Opening Scuff Plate and Seat Belt Retractor Cover on Daycab

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Opening Scuff Plate and Seat Belt Retractor Cover on Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 73 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four torx head screws (Item 1) securing cab door opening scuff plate (Item 2) to cab floor, passenger side shown. Lay torx head screws out of the way and save for installation.

Remove push-in fastener (Item 3) securing seat belt retractor cover (Item 4) to seat belt retractor assembly (Item 5), passenger side shown. Lay push-in fastener and cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover out of the way and save for installation.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover.

figure.caption: Figure 73. Cab Door Opening Scuff Plate and Seat Belt Retractor Cover on Sleeper Cab on Sleeper Cab
